title: Environment-Based Science Learning Design: Strengthening Sustainability and Ethical Awareness

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: A short-term intensive course conducted at vocational training institutions, designed to enable students to scientifically analyze environmental issues and explore practical solutions. A blended learning format combining online learning using personal devices and field practice

learning_goals: Learners can analyze scientific models explaining environmental system interactions with 80% accuracy.
Learners can collaboratively design experiment plans to address local environmental issues and execute them at least once in two attempts.
Learners can make correct choices in decision-making scenarios applying environmental ethics principles with over 70% accuracy.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
